plot: Ever wondered what became of Maxwell when he returned from Where the Wild Things were? Here is the story Maurice Sandek never got to tell. Join us for a revealing look into the life and times this storied character as an adult.
title: Where the Wild Things Are Now
plot_es: Ever wondered what became of Maxwell when he returned from Where the Wild Things were? Here is the story Maurice Sandek never got to tell. Join us for a revealing look into the life and times this storied character as an adult.
original_name: Where the Wild Things Are Now
